name: Dino Life: Dinosaur Games Free For Kids, Sounds, Puzzle & Memo Game
name_original: Dino Life: Dinosaur Games Free For Kids, Sounds, Puzzle & Memo Game
description:
Dino Life: Dinosaur Games Free For Kids - Is your little dino hunter a big lover of ravenous dinos: t-rex, raptor, triceratops and dino bones? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in dinosaur puzzle games for kids. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging dino roar sounds and dinosaur noises your little kid can explore in the game...but the the isle dinosaurs games doesn't end there.

The activity app also comes with a mini dinos matching game , and many beautiful, real dinosaur puzzle games.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a monster is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of wild dinosaurs
- 4 fun memory games of variety dino pictures
- 10 Real, high quality puzzles for 3 difficulty level with many jurassic dino
- Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids in this app family.

Another amazingly cool feature to the dinosaur games for kids 5 years free makes it even more awesome then just matching your little boy or girl must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little kids dinosaur games shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing dino life: dinosaur games free for kids also promotes:
- Fine motor skills.
- Memory and recognition skills.
- Hand eye coordination.
- Early math concepts.
- dino knowledge

This free dinosaur games for kids for toddlers application is under active development, we always welcome your suggestion to improve "dino life sounds and puzzles" application.
Please send us email on appkeszito101 [-at-] gmail.com

Don't wait! Download now and enjoy!
